metadata.title: CVE-2020-11868 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ntpd in ntp before 4.2.8p14 and 4.3.x before 4.3.100 allows an off-path attacker to block unauthenticated synchronization via a server mode packet with a spoofed source IP address, because transmissions are rescheduled even when a packet lacks a valid origin timestamp.

criterions.comment: ntp package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
ntpsec package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
